step.cmd: Click one of the links at the bottom of the License Activation window for getting the license file:

note.p: A license key is required for downloading a license file.

li.p: If the StellarOne is connected to the Internet, click Get License File

If the StellarOne is not connected to the Internet, click Copy Download Link and save the copied link in a text file. Send the text file to the computer with Interent connection and open the copied link in a web browser.

step.cmd: You will be directed to the License File Management screen. Specify your license key in the License Key field, and then click Download.
A pop-up window appears showing the license information. Read it carefully and click Yes for downloading the license file.

note.p: The StellarOne without Internet connection can access the license file via the internal security network or a trusted portable device.
